quotes.quote: Gratitude is born in hearts that take time to count up past mercies.
quotes.author: Charles E. Jefferson

quotes.quote: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues, but the parent of all others.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: These days grief seems like walking on a frozen river; most of the time he feels safe enough, but there is always that danger he will plunge through.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Gratitude is merely the secret hope of further favors.
quotes.author: Jacques Maritain

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the most exquisite form of courtesy.
quotes.author: John Bradford

quotes.quote: There but for the grace of God go [I].
quotes.author: Roberto Benigni

quotes.quote: Gratitude can sometimes be as annoying as whininess.
It's a sign of mediocrity when you demonstrate gratitude with moderation.
